entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023
